goals__remit: KGH Global Consulting is an independent consultancy company within the KGH Group, assisting government agencies and businesses all over the world with Customs capacity building and implementation of modernized Border Management. With more than 700 Customs experts and a global network of partners, we offer state-of-the-art solutions based on global best practices and international standards.
